H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H6881.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>}

H847.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Dan<SDBH:דָּן>}
